text:
### Enable SMS (Short Message Service) for Vitae

If your subscription has the SMS enabled, the **Short Message Service (SMS)**
tile will be available in the **Service settings** page.

In the **Service settings** page, you can turn on the switch at the **Short
Message Service (SMS)** tile, so that the learners and trainers of Vitae can
use mobile phones to receive notifications in text messages for the course,
assessment, and payment services.
